message.content:
cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.MA, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with assortment optimization, which is a problem in revenue management and pricing. It also draws connections to pricing problems studied in theoretical computer science. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory), followed by cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves probability theory and optimization, which are covered in cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems) and cs.IT (Information Theory), respectively.
